text: The code will be stored in GitHub and on library computers; Library will maintain data and its expression for next 15 years, with updates to site based on changes in technology as necessary.
Describe how the digital project record will be sustained by UO Libraries.

Going forward, Sarah will have ultimately responsibility for checking in and making sure whoever is in library roles is aware of this project and our agreement. The digital librarians at UI Library and those connected to the CDIL will maintain the data and code in the digital archive as well.
